Package com.nrifintech.cms.controllers

Class WalletController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.WalletController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/wallet/") public class WalletController extends Object
> This class is a Spring controller that handles requests to the `/wallet` endpoint

  • Method Details

    • getWallet

      @GetMapping("getwallet/{walletId}") public Response getWallet​(@PathVariable Integer walletId, Principal principal)
      It gets the wallet of the user who is logged in
      Parameters:
      walletId - The id of the wallet you want to get.
      principal - This is the user object that is passed to the controller.
      Returns:
      A wallet object.

    • addMoney

      @PostMapping("addmoney/{amount}") public Response addMoney​(Principal principal, @PathVariable Integer amount, @RequestBody StripeToken token) throws com.stripe.exception.StripeException
      It adds money to the wallet of the user who is logged in
      Parameters:
      principal - This is the user object that is passed by spring security.
      amount - The amount to be added to the wallet.
      token - This is the token that is generated by Stripe.js.
      Returns:
      Response object is being returned.
      Throws:
      com.stripe.exception.StripeException
